newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Barr Laboratories cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Barr Laboratories cut.

text.p: Gruntal & Co said it downgraded Barr Laboratories Inc to hold from buy.
-- said stock has surpassed its one-year price target of $33.

-- also cited flat-to-down near-term earning outlook, ample price/earnings valuation, and recent setback with Premarin, a drug for menopause and osteoperosis. The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said Premarin is not generically equivalent to the brand drug.
-- said still "enthusiastic" about long-term outlook for Barr.
